blog

Best rooftop bar in Prague

Tucked away among the winding, cobbled streets of Prague lies a treasure waiting to be unearthed - Casablanca, the beautiful secret bar in Prague. Drawing inspiration from the allure of a time shrouded in mystery, Casablanca stands as a sanctuary for the discerning, emerging as the pinnacle of Prague's clandestine bar scene.

posted by

Albert Orion

Jul 16, 2023
